title: CBT Nuggets - VMware vSphere 5.5 VCA-DCV VCP5-DCV with Greg Shie
description:
CBT Nuggets - VMware vSphere 5.5 VCA-DCV VCP5-DCV with Greg Shields
-------------------------------------------------------------------

This VMware vSphere video training series with Greg Shields covers the latest version of VMwareÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s flagship virtualization platform. It discusses the core topics in managing, troubleshooting, and deploying a production-ready virtual datacenter atop VMware vSphere v5.5. It further reviews the concepts that prepare a candidate for passing the VCP550 and VCAD510 exams to obtain the VMware Certified Professional and VMware Certified Associate certifications. 

 Recommended skills: 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Familiarity with basic virtualization concepts
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Familiarity with VMware Workstation
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Familiarity with basic installation of Windows Server 2012


 Recommended equipment: 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢One or more desktop or laptop computers with a combined 16 GB of RAM
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢One or more copies of VMware Workstation (latest version)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢SSD hard disks recommended


 Related certifications: 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢VCA-DCV
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢VCP5-DCV


 Related job functions: 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢IT professionals
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Server administrators
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Virtual administrators
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Storage administrators
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Network administrators 


Two exams in one series! Veteran CBT Nuggets instructor Greg Shields gives his VMware vSphere training a complete refresh for vSphere 5.5. In this series, you'll get the topics you need for success in deploying and managing a vSphere 5.5 infrastructure. You'll also prepare yourself for both the VCA-DCV and VCP5-DCV certification exams as you explore the design, implementation, protection, and maintenance of a vSphere virtual environment.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
